channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish Families
channel.desc: Nev and Kamie receive a request to help Dre finally meet elusive Casey. But the request is unconventional and the situation becomes so intense, the hosts question if they should continue. (S8, ep13).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish Families
channel.desc: A concerned son reaches out when his mum's online boyfriend seems too shady for comfort. But Mum is hiding secrets of her own, and once Nev and Max find their man, things take a weird turn. (S7, ep1).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish Families
channel.desc: Alante has been planning a life with his online love. She's perfect but her disappearances have Alante worried. Nev and Max help uncover a truth that affects Alante's entire town. (S6, ep2).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish Families
channel.desc: After months of intimate texts with Titus, a man she met online, Candice has decided to tell to her husband. But before she does, she asks Nev to help her find out who Titus really is! (S5, ep16).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Badass Brides
channel.desc: Amy is set on a 'twisted Christmas' theme for her big day, which includes marking the event with tattoo ink. (S1, ep3).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master
channel.desc: From trash to treasure, the Teams must use their ingenuity to create recycled masterpieces in the Flash Challenge. A shocking Elimination shakes up the Competition. (S16, ep4).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Jersey Shore Family Vacation
channel.desc: The squad parties in Atlantic City on Halloween. Pauly plans a major surprise for Nikki. Angelina receives grim news. (S8, ep7).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Caught In The Act
channel.desc: Gianni always knew he was Alondra's first, but after Tami uncovers the truth, he may soon realise he just might be her last. (S3, ep25).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Skin A&E
channel.desc: Top dermatologists help members of the public with a range of skin conditions. (S3, ep7).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: I Used To Be Fat
channel.desc: 250lb Marci is off to college and wants a life of friends and cute clothes. But will her bootcamp-style trainer be extreme enough to battle years of junk food and insecurity? (S1, ep2).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: After years of hot drama, Gemini is desperate to find Myranda. But the script flips with the first intervention ever for an infamous repeat catfish! (S8, ep10).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: The Hills
channel.desc: Now that Heidi and Spencer have had her engagement rock resized at the jewellers, Heidi suggests that her husband-to-be come home with her to Colorado to meet the family. (S3, ep4).

channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: The Hills
channel.desc: Audrina's back from a weekend away with Justin and she just can't stop smiling. After all the drama, it seems they've decided to officially become a couple. (S3, ep7).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Teen Mom
channel.desc: The Mums are all invited to LA for a photo shoot, but a misunderstanding leads to a fight that pits Kayla and Rachel against each other. Kayla gets upsetting news about her son Izaiah. (S3, ep22).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Teen Mom
channel.desc: Cory's daughter has surgery. Catelynn and Tyler talk to Nova about body safety. Leah is proud when Aliannah decides to write about her experience with muscular dystrophy. (S1, ep21).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Teen Mom
channel.desc: Jade and Cheyenne visit Briana in Florida and all eyes are on her and Devoin's relationship. (S1, ep22).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
channel.desc: The new candidates get an eye-opening taste of what it means to be a DCC; girls struggle to learn the dances; Melissa Rycroft meets the new girls for the first time. (S11, ep3).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
channel.desc: With the first cut looming, the girls must push their dance skills to the limit. Stress increases on makeover day as the girls try to get the DCC look. (S11, ep4).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Ramon met Paola on Facebook and established an exclusive online relationship. But after many failed attempts to video chat, is she really who he thinks she is? (S2, ep3).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Nev and Max attempt to help a young woman named Nae track down her elusive internet celebrity crush and soon find themselves embroiled in a Catfish conspiracy! (S7, ep16).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Nev and Max receive emails from opposite sides of the same online romance, each concerned that the other may be a catfish! What happens next leaves Nev and Max stunned! (S6, ep8).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Tyreme met the beautiful Tomorrow online over 9 months ago. Tyreme is ready to uproot his life to be with her. Will Nev and Max be able help Tyreme finally meet his Tomorrow? (S5, ep9).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Fashion designer Truth is hot for his online crush despite the fact he's in a relationship. The drama deepens when Nev and co-host Zeke Thomas find out who's behind the profile. (S7, ep23).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Smart, single mum Miracle fell for Javonni, a dreamy-eyed Instagrammer. With Max on hiatus, Nev teams up with tv personality Charlamagne to take Miracle on a hunt for the man of her dreams. (S4, ep2).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: After five years of talking to Matt, Kim is ready to meet up. As Max and Nev try to bring the two together, they uncover buried secrets that threaten to drive a wedge between the couple. (S7, ep3).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Catfish
channel.desc: Luis has fallen for a single mum, and now he's ready to take their online relationship to the next level. But first Nev and Max must help him make sure that she is who she says she is! (S5, ep19).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Celebs On The Farm
channel.desc: It's the Grand Final! After two weeks of mud, sweat and tears, the emotional finalists give it one last push to prove to Farmer Chris they deserve to be crowned 'Supreme Champion'! (S3, ep10).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Teen Mom UK
channel.desc: Ellie's fuming over Luke's actions on social media. Matt talks about not being able to read Teddy a story. Chloe weighs up the pros and cons of living on her own. (S1, ep8).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Skin A&E
channel.desc: Top dermatologists help members of the public with a range of skin conditions. (S3, ep8).

channel.title: Ink Master
channel.desc: Massive murals have teams struggling for composure in the Flash Challenge. The battle for Ink Master continues with Japanese Samurai tattoos. A backward hand sparks heated debate. (S16, ep5).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master Redemption
channel.desc: Jesse Smith and Clint Cummings return to face unhappy canvases and their bitter better-halves. (S2, ep11).

channel.desc: Honour is on the line as Lydia Bruno and Lalo return to redeem their mistakes on unhappy military veteran Canvases. (S2, ep10).

channel.desc: Rob, Steelo, and Karrueche Tran place an order for some 'delivery legends', discover how chaotic cute can be with 'otter chaos', then sleep it all off with some much needed 'drunk naps'. (S39, ep31).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ridiculousness
channel.desc: Rob, Steelo, and Karrueche Tran get a taste of 'big cheesin'', check out who's 'too young for a phone' and rock out with 'concert props'. (S39, ep30).

channel.name: MTV UK
channel.title: Ink Master
channel.desc: The Artists step aside and put faith in their Coaches as Cleen and Christian each tattoo four Canvases in a head-to-head marathon. The Artists must then tattoo galaxies. (S11, ep7).

channel.title: Ink Master
channel.desc: The Artists must scour the depths of their imagination to create mind-bending masterpieces with sidewalk chalk. The Grudge Match continues for $100K and the title of Ink Master. (S11, ep8).

channel.desc: Brianna worries that Braeson may need some additional help with his missing limb. After Christian misses Camille's 2nd birthday, Rachel trys to plan a family vacation to Florida. (S3, ep23).

channel.title: Teen Mom
channel.desc: Catelynn is heartbroken when her family attacks her on social media. Sean plans a surprise for Jade. Zach meets with Bar to discuss the beef between Cheyenne and Ashley. (S1, ep23).
